metadata.title: CVE-2020-7914 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA 2019.2, an XSLT debugger plugin misconfiguration allows arbitrary file read operations over the network. This issue was fixed in 2019.3.

criterions.comment: intellij-community-idea package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
